mapper.select: SELECT work.work_id AS workId, work.work_status AS workStatus, work.work_date AS workDate, alba.alba_name AS albaName, alba.alba_phone AS albaPhone, alba.alba_status AS albaStatus FROM work LEFT JOIN alba ON work.alba_id = alba.alba_id WHERE work.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY work.work_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work (alba_id, work_date, work_status) VALUES (#{albaId}, #{workDate}, #{workStatus})
